attributes.action: Make blood & organ donation a mandatory education subject for 14-18 year olds
attributes.additional_details:
Make blood & organ donation a mandatory education subject for 14-18 year olds. It will increase the donor register, save the NHS up to £150m per year and save 1000 lives each year.

(1) Refer to: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RZQSwn2Q95M
(2) Refer to: http://www.giveandletlive.co.uk/
(3) Refer to: http://www.jeanettecrizzletrust.org/
